summary.span: 將 (或可以轉換成 的物件) 轉換為指定型別。

span.span: Converts an (or an object that can be cast to an ) to a specified type.

returns.span: 這個方法傳回轉換過的物件。

span.span: This method returns the converted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作會呼叫物件上的方法的物件是否有效，而且如果目的型別是`string`。The default implementation calls the method on the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is `string`. 如果這個方法無法轉換成目的型別，則會擲回例外狀況。If this method cannot convert to the destination type, it throws a exception.

span.span: The conversion could not be performed.
